newsitem.title: COTE D'IVOIRE: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - Oct 23.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - Oct 23.

text.p: These are significant items in the Ivorian press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these items and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- Five heads of state and five heads of government in Ivory Coast's commercial capital Abidjan for launch of U.N.-sponsored Alliance for Africa's Industrialisation. - State carrier Air Ivoire to resume flights to Liberian capital Monrovia from October 27. Flights planned Sunday, Wednesday, Friday. (Advertisement)

- Constitutive general assembly to turn Abidjan's Bourse into a regional stock exchange serving the seven nations of the West African Economic and Monetary Union (UEMOA) before the end of the first half of 1997 will be held in Togo on December 12; decision taken at meeting on Tuesday of West African CFA franc zone's central bank and representatives of private sector shareholders.
- Five people burnt to death in fire in illicit perfume factory in Abidjan
